author: Rafael Baptista
text:
As part of my MPA internship, I am helping my county look at driver education programs aimed at teaching county employees using the county fleet how to improve fuel efficiency while driving. I have done online research and found examples of counties that have certain policies about idling and give tips to drivers. I was wondering if anyone here has a formal driver education policy or has any system in place to get employees to drive more efficiently. 
Thanks
Rafael Baptista
title: Fuel Efficiency Education for Government Employees
